name: Recursive Hate - Spider Hell DEMO
description:
Recursive Hate is a single / co-op survival versus big, realistic and terrifying spiders and versus swarms with literally thousands of spiders.

Welcome to arachnophobic hell! 

There will be several game modes. At this moment you can donwload demo and play with some weapons and spiders.  

Only single-player is avalale in demo.  And no girls in demo yet. 

Try to survive in Spider Hell

Spiders - goliath spiders, tarantulas, venomous black widows, jumpy spiders, etc.

Weapons - rifle, shotgun, machine gun and the most important - flamethrower. Burn them all!!!

WISHLIST ON STEAM
